argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ressbas.r | |- R = ( W |`s A ) |
| 2 |  | ressbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-ss | |- ( A C_ B <-> ( A i^i B ) = A ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_biimpi | |- ( A C_ B -> ( A i^i B ) = A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ssex | |- ( A C_ B -> A e. _V ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_ressbas | |- ( A e. _V -> ( A i^i B ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( A C_ B -> ( A i^i B ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( A C_ B -> A = ( Base ` R ) ) |
